[Y]Hidden Gems
[W]Budget boxes full of surprises.
[c][m.]
[W]Some low-price releases had inventive
[W]mechanics and memorable art direction.
[W]Trying odd genres often reveals your
[W]next favourite.
[c][m.]
[G]- Read mini reviews.
[G]- Try weird covers.
[G]- Give each game ten minutes.
[m][m-]
[Y]GEM HUNT
[C]Underhyped titles often take bigger
[C]risks.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
